entry.title: WIND WARNING , Sandspit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sandspit Airport 3:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 95 %

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 early this evening then to 80 gusting to 110 after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 80 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning then to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
